command.name: add-module-operation
command.title: Add a module operation on a given database entity
command.help:
This command adds an operation in a module to perform some action on a database entity. The MODULE is the name of the module in the application and ENTITY is the name of the database table. The OPERATION is the name of the Ada procedure and must be a valid Ada identifier. The generated operation has the following signature:
procedure <operation> (Module : in <module>_Module; Entity : in out <project>.<module>.Models.<entity>_Ref'Class);
The following files are updated to register the new operation:
src/<project>-<module>-modules.ads src/<project>-<module>-modules.adb
